Title: Beowulf
Genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Anonymous (epic poem "Beowulf"), Mark Leahy (screenplay), David Chappe (screenplay)
Actors: Christopher Lambert, Rhona Mitra, Oliver Cotton, Götz Otto
Plot: This post-apocalyptic future story is based on the 8th century Saxon epic poem about the knight who battled a monster in a medieval castle. In this story, Beowulf is a wanderer who learns about a man-eating creature called Grendel which comes in the night to devour warriors trapped at the Outpost. The Outpost is ruled by Hrothgar. He has a daughter, whose husband may have been murdered by the Outpost's master of arms.
